p: The 0.25 mg/ml 2,2-diphenyl-1-picryl-hydrazyl-hydrate (DPPH, Sigma Aldrich) solution in methanol (working solution) was used to determine the antioxidant capacity. Stock solutions were prepared at the sample concentration of 10 mg/ml. The preliminary tests were carried out on TLC Silica gel 60 F₂₅₄ (Merck). After impregnating 2 μl/spot of stock solutions on the TLC plate, the plate was dipped into the DPPH working solution and incubated at the room temperature 30 minutes. The positive test indicated the yellow on the violet background [ 34].
